What's cool about it:

    A surreal and gritty storyline panned out over 20 ultra-violent multi-level maps.
    Breakneck gunplay in bloodstained neon corridors combined with an intense, pumping soundtrack.
    Gut-wrenching battles against a bizarre cast of bosses from MiamiÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s underground.
    Wield 35 different weapons - from shotguns and assault rifles to katanas and lead pipes - everything is at your disposal.

Overview:

Hotline Miami is a high-octane action game overflowing with raw brutality, hard-boiled gunplay and skull crushing close combat. Set in an alternative 1989 Miami, you will assume the role of a mysterious antihero on a murderous rampage against the shady underworld at the behest of voices on your answering machine. Soon you'll find yourself struggling to get a grip of what is going on and why you are prone to these acts of violence.

Rely on your wits to choreograph your way through seemingly impossible situations as you constantly find yourself outnumbered by vicious enemies. The action is unrelenting and every shot is deadly so each move must be quick and decisive if you hope to survive and unveil the sinister forces driving the bloodshed. Hotline MiamiÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s unmistakable visual style, a driving soundtrack, and a surreal chain of events will have you question your own thirst for blood while pushing you to the limits with a brutally unforgiving challenge.

Minimum system requirements: Minimum system requirements: Windows XP / Windows Vista / Windows 7, 1.8 GHz Processor, 1GB RAM, 3D graphics card compatible with DirectX 9.0c, 250 MB HD space, Mouse, Keyboard.

Install with setup_hotline_miami_2.0.0.4.exe
Update the game to V.3 by installing patch_hotline_miami_2.0.1.5.exe
Play.
